alfredsnippet.snippet:
S. Rosseland, Electrical State of a Star, MNRAS, 84, 308, 1924, p.721

"Net Electrical Charge of a Star - It has been recognised by several authors that a star constructed of strongly ionised matter would be expected to carry a resultant positive electric volume charge."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Net Electrical Charge of a Star
